attributes.description:
THIS BEAUTIFUL SUV IS IN PRISTINE CONDITION AND BOASTS ITSELF WITH GREAT FEATURES.
-AUTOMATIC STOP/START 
AUTOMATIC LOCK WHEN DRIVING AWAY.
-ALARM SYSTEM WITH RADIO REMOTE CONTROL.
-ACTIVE HIGH BEAM CONTROL.
-ADJUSTABLE SPEED LIMITER.
-APPLE CAR PLAY.
-AMBIENT LIGHTING.
-19" V-SPOKE ALLOY WHEELS.
-BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY.
-PREMIMUN NAVIGATION PROFESSIONAL 
-ROOF RAILS ALUMINUM SATINATED.
-PARKING DISTANCE CONTROL(PDC) FRONT & REAR.
-REVERSING CAMERA.
-PANORAMA SUNROOF
-LEATHERTEC BLACK
-DAYTIME RUNNING LIGHTS LED.
-ECO MODE.
-AUX/USB INPUT SOCKET.
-AUTO CLIMATE CONTROL WITH DUAL TEMP ZONES.
-FOG LIGHTS -FRONT WITH CONERING FUNCTION.
-HEADLIGHTS - AUTO ON/OFF FUNCTION.
-LED HEADLIGHTS.
-MULTI FUNCTION CONTROL SCREEN.
-REVERSING CAMERA.
MAKE THIS STUNNING CAR YOURS TODAY AND TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THIS GREAT DEAL.FINANCE AVAILABLE. TRADE INS WELCOME

attributes.description:
2019 Mercedes-Benz X 350d 4matic
100 000 km with full agent service history.
This bakkie is is excellent condition inside and out and comes loaded with awesome extras such as LED lights, navigation, 360 camera, parktronic, keyless entry/start, electric seats /mirrors, rough road specification, aftermarket 4x4 mag wheels equipped with nice all terrain tyres, nudge bar, roll bar, tow bar, bin roller lid, the list just continues.
Honestly the best bakkie I have ever driven and most certainly the sexiest.
This beaut is selling for R749 950

attributes.description: In the market for a vehicle? We have you covered, All our vehicles passes a Ford approved 160 point quality check, we provide a roadworthy certificate on delivery and proof of service history. We offer a selection of finance option through all major banks. We do accept trade ins. To apply for finance we will need the following: ID, Drivers license, Latest payslip, 3 Months bank statements & Proof of address! Want to chat and find out a bit more? Give us a call and chat to one of our friendly staff members!
